text: What might be the reason that Julia through `OutOfMemoryError()` ? For same script, if my data has 524 rows then I get above error. But for some reason, If i filter the data which remain with only 64 rows, the script is running fine. I do not understand why this is happening. Is my system fault or something else?

elements.text: What might be the reason that Julia through

? For same script, if my data has 524 rows then I get above error. But for some reason, If i filter the data which remain with only 64 rows, the script is running fine. I do not understand why this is happening. Is my system fault or something else?

text:
Almost always the reason for an OutOfMemoryError is that you are out of memory.

So if your script is doing something like allocating a
n x n x n x n 4D array of Float64s
then for n=64, then that would allocate 125 MB.
but for n=524 then that would allocate 561 GB.
